name: Bubble Shooter Mania
description:
Shoot and destroy as many bubble make them fall , many color bubble will make your mood happily , its like classic version bubble shooter , very easy and addictive to play.

Shoot buuble ball with same colour to make them fall ,collect coin to purchase power bubble, destroy all bubbles to finishing level.

Game will over when buuble going touch to the floor, available many level that you can finish and we will always update new level to make game more addict.

There available power bubble that you can purchase using coin.

Colour bubble : use colour bubble to destroy any colour bubble.

Missile bubble : shoot any bubble that obstacle your way.

Swapping : use swapping to make bubble again going to top.
